titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (FINAL) - Description

div.p: LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (FINAL) is the same as attribute LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE.
LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (FINAL) is the final LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE allocated by the CARE PROFESSIONAL.

p.b: Note: This data item is included in the Mental Health Services Data Set, but should not be submitted until further development by NHS Digital has been undertaken.
